title: Wider, flatter Reserve 28 XC carbon wheels hit 1367g with no rider weight limit
content:
The all-new Reserve 28 XC Wheelset is the first of their mountain lineup to drop the Santa Cruz branding, ushering in a new era of independence for the carbon wheel manufacturers. It’s also the first of their mountain bike wheel lineup to see a new asymmetric rim bed, lower in profile for added strength and […]

The post Wider, flatter Reserve 28 XC carbon wheels hit 1367g with no rider weight limit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
